Name: starelid
Description: the table or index that the described column belongs to

Name: staattnum
Description: the number of the described column

Name: stainherit
Description: if true, the stats include inheritance child columns, not just the values in the specified relation

Name: stanullfrac
Description: the fraction of the column's entries that are null

Name: stawidth
Description: the average stored width, in bytes, of nonnull entries

Name: stadistinct
Description: the number of distinct nonnull data values in the column. a value greater than zero is the actual number of distinct values. a value less than zero is the negative of a multiplier for the number of rows in the table; for example, a column in which about 80% of the values are nonnull and each nonnull value appears about twice on average could be represented by stadistinct = -0.4. a zero value means the number of distinct values is unknown.
